channel.title: Cloud-Native on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Cloud-Native on Arrans github.io

item.title: juicedata/juicefs
item.description: JuiceFS is a distributed POSIX file system built on top of Redis and S3.

item.title: pingcap/tidb
item.description: TiDB - the open-source, cloud-native, distributed SQL database designed for modern applications.

item.title: loft-sh/vcluster
item.description: vCluster - Create fully functional virtual Kubernetes clusters - Each vcluster runs inside a namespace of the underlying k8s cluster. It’s cheaper than creating separate full-blown clusters and it offers better multi-tenancy and isolation than regular namespaces.

item.title: go-dev-frame/sponge
item.description: A powerful and easy-to-use Go development framework that enables you to effortlessly build stable, reliable, and high-performance backend services with a “low-code” approach.

item.title: cncf/tag-security
item.description: 🔐CNCF Security Technical Advisory Group – secure access, policy control, privacy, auditing, explainability and more!

item.title: kcl-lang/kcl
item.description: KCL Programming Language (CNCF Sandbox Project). https://kcl-lang.io
